title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [NEW LAUNCH] What’s new with Amazon CloudWatch (COP363)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - [新发布] Amazon CloudWatch 新功能 (COP363)
abstract: Learn how Amazon CloudWatch helps you go from data to decisions faster, simpler and more autonomously — from streamlined data ingestion and analytics workflows to new AIOps capabilities. We’ll showcase the latest innovations across CloudWatch that make ingesting and analyzing data easier at any scale. We’ll show how you can use agentic observability systems that make your operations faster and smarter. Whether you’re a builder, SRE, or product owner, discover how AWS observability is redefining how you collect, understand, and act on your telemetry.
abstract_cn: 了解 Amazon CloudWatch 如何帮助您更快速、更简单、更自主地从数据转向决策——从简化的数据摄取和分析工作流程到全新的 AIOps 功能。我们将展示 CloudWatch 的最新创新，这些创新使任何规模的数据摄取和分析变得更加容易。我们将展示如何使用代理式可观测性系统，让您的运营更快速、更智能。无论您是构建者、SRE 还是产品负责人，都可以了解 AWS 可观测性如何重新定义您收集、理解遥测数据并采取行动的方式。
